# NEFilterAction

**Enumeration**

The actions a data provider can take on a filter flow.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NEFilterAction
```

## Overview

The control provider receives a filter report when the data provider issues a verdict with the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterVerdict/shouldReport] property set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. The report contains an [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterReport/action] property set to one of the values listed here.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NEFilterAction.invalid**: Invalid action used to represent an error.
- **NEFilterAction.allow**: Allow the flow.
- **NEFilterAction.drop**: Drop the flow.
- **NEFilterAction.remediate**: Remediate the flow.
- **NEFilterAction.filterData**: Filter data on the flow.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting report properties

- **flow**: The flow on which the associated action was taken.
- **action**: The action taken on the reported flow.
- **event**: The type of event indicated by this report.
- **NEFilterReport.Event**: A type that represents the kind of event indicated by a report.
- **bytesInboundCount**: The number of inbound bytes received from the flow.
- **bytesOutboundCount**: The number of outbound bytes sent on the flow.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
